snippet: Friends and admirers of Elliott Carter paid tribute to him and his music on Sunday night not in a concert hall but in Le Poisson Rouge, a Greenwich Village club.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews memorial concert for composer Elliott Carter, featuring performances of his works by various musicians and admirers, at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: Friends and admirers of Elliott Carter paid tribute to him and his music on Sunday night not in a concert hall but in Le Poisson Rouge, a Greenwich Village club.

headline.seo: Elliott Carter Memorial at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: The Honoree Would’ve Felt at Home
headline.print_headline: The Honoree Would’ve Felt at Home
